extendedInfo.description: The count number game for kids. The target assumes a three-year-olds around.1-10 range(you can increase to 20 from option) you can use original sound(e.g. parent voice). easy recording tool included.First, you record only one file, please check that your device can read and play back sound.Why can not I play depends on the device.If so, select a different format, please try to record and check again.This application program is developed by the ad.!!!!Permissions!!!!!android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE:AD MODULEandroid.permission.INTERNET:AD MODULE and bugreportandroid.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE:recording tool and bugreportandroid.permission.RECORD_AUDIO:recording tool*read phone state and identity permission is granted automatically. because this application supports OS1.5.********************************************************Please try following if the error comes always to happen. +clear chache from application manageror+clear data from application managerkeywordlearn number kids child

reviews.comment: Seems awesome.  Had no prob inputting my voice on Google nexus device.  Can\'t wait to show my daughter when she wakes up.  Perfect for my 3 year old
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing free app
reviews.comment: Daughter loves it. It\'s helped her so much. Can\'t thank you enough. Please keep the development coming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.comment: I was looking for a game that didn\'t take up too much space but was free and fun, well, I found it and then some... Recording the number names myself is so cool! And there are so many different games my kid can play...
reviews.author: Amanda Al-tayyib

reviews.title: Record my voice?
reviews.comment: I tried recording my voice, I save and went back to the activities but my voice hadn\'t saved after all. I\'m not sure what I\'m doing wrong, aside from that I think this app is amazing, my daughter will be turning two soon and I find the activities great for her to learn her numbers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: Grand baby loves it. Thanks for sharing.
reviews.author: Grammy Anon

reviews.title: What I was looking for... and more!
reviews.comment: I was really looking for an app in Spanish to teach my little girl the numbers, I happened to go by this one and to my surprise it has what I was looking for; but since it lets you record the numbers with your own voice, I do have it in Spanish!!! Thank you so much! My only request would be to let us record the symbols (+, -, =, etc) as well; it\'s kind of dead without sounds with the symbols. But my little girl enjoys hearing mommy telling her the npmbers! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome game!
reviews.comment: Even without sound this game is complex and brilliant. It helps the kid memorize and recognize numbers. Missing sound involves arents too and gives chance to spend some time with the kid and enjoy his achievements. Great!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Would pay for version that reaches to 100 gladly!
reviews.author: Marcela Ramirez

reviews.title: Speech not working Nexus 7
reviews.comment: There\'s no speech sounds! Useless for teaching a toddler without this. Please fix and I will wait for update. If bug fix works I will change my review.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but very good!
reviews.comment: This is what Im looking for my toddler!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a simple, fun counting app. My three year old occasionally likes to play it, although its a little too easy for her. The only complaint I have is that when she touches the screen and the picture appears, there is a delay before the sound. This makes it say the wrong number. For example, when three appears,  it is still saying \"two\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good...
reviews.comment: Needs to go higher than 10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t teach anything. It does it all for you. Poor app. And uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Voice record doesnt work
reviews.comment: This would be a 4 star if it had audio or if something would tell me how to record audio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nunnum kids
reviews.comment: Very simple.  Not that much fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: More work needed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good for first learning numbers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too simple. Not educational enough for my 3 year old.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would b nice if it said #\'s as the child hit them. The voice rec doesnt work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. It totally keeps my daughter entertain. I just wish they have an upgraded version that counts to 20
reviews.author: A Google User
